channel.title: terraform on Sergsoares
channel.description: Recent content in terraform on Sergsoares

item.title: Solved issues are great in open source terraform
item.description: Test Errors be part of our day work at tech, but working with open source facilitate a lot, tools like terraform show us that community has power. At work today received the below error in a “terraform plan”: Stack trace from the terraform-provider-aws_v3.74.0_x5 plugin: panic: interface conversion: interface {} is nil, not *conns.AWSClient And with a fast search I found a Github Issue in Terraform recommending update Terraform version. Errors are not cool, but solved issues are.
